name: Caroline Chisholm
what_did:
Caroline Chisholm helped poor immigrants and especially women coming to Australia.
She found them jobs, homes, and helped families stay together.
She worked hard to make life better for others.
why_matters:
Chisholm showed kindness and courage by helping people start new lives.
She is remembered as one of Australia's greatest helpers.
fun_fact: Caroline Chisholm once appeared on Australiaâ€™s five-dollar note!
